text: Ne nohelesia balia abahebwa eshitabu ebifune bioosi shibalaloonda Kibla shishio tawe, nawe sholi uloonda Kibla shiabu tawe, Ne abeene khubeene shibakhaloonda Kibla shiowundi tawe, Ne niwitsukhana waloonda eshia emioyo chiabu chienya obumanyi nibumalile okhuulila ,toto hawo olaba mubandu abamabii
